resources.string: Press OK to remove the minus \'-\' from all the phone numbers.
Please Check the Extra Items to Remove
All phone numbers have been fixed!
No numbers need to be fixed
The Prefix of mobile must be spcified!
If the Country Code is Empty, the area code CANNOT be remvoed if the country code is present in the number!

Since you want to remove the country code, all the mobile prefixes available in the country are required. 
If all the mobiles start with 13, 16 or 19, you must fill 13,16,19 in the NEXT screen. 
The numbers starting with any one of the Mobile Prefixes will not be prefixed a 0 after its country code has been removed. 
Each mobile prefix can be separated by non numerical characters and needn't to be sorted.
